mineru.api_key: Mineru now offers a daily free quota of 500 pages, and you do not need to enter a key.

miniapps.empty: Drag mini apps from the left to hide them
miniapps.sidebar_description: Show active mini apps in the sidebar
miniapps.title: Mini Apps Settings

endpoint_type.label: Endpoint Type
endpoint_type.tooltip: Select the API endpoint type format

check.disclaimer: Health check requires sending requests, please use it with caution. Models that charge per request may incur additional costs, please bear the responsibility.
check.no_api_keys: No API keys found, please add API keys first.
check.select_api_key: Select the API key to use:
check.title: Model health check

models.default_assistant_model_description: Model used when creating a new assistant, if the assistant is not set, this model will be used

add_listed.confirm: Are you sure you want to add all models to the list?
add_listed.label: Add models to the list

models.provider_key_add_confirm: Do you want to add the API key for {{provider}}?
models.provider_key_add_failed_by_empty_data: Failed to add provider API key, data is empty
models.provider_key_add_failed_by_invalid_data: Failed to add provider API key, data format error

models.provider_key_no_change: API key for {{provider}} has not changed

models.topic_naming_model_description: Model used when automatically naming a new topic
models.translate_model_prompt_message: Please enter the translate model prompt

check.warn: Please be cautious when selecting this option. Incorrect selection may cause the model to malfunction!

service_tier.tip: Specifies the latency tier to use for processing the request

summary_text_mode.tip: A summary of the reasoning performed by the model
summary_text_mode.title: Summary Mode

privacy.enable_privacy_mode: Anonymous reporting of errors and statistics
privacy.title: Privacy Settings

url.tip: Ending with / ignores v1, ending with # forces use of input address

api_key.label: API Key
api_key.tip: Multiple keys separated by commas or spaces

apiversion.tip: The API version of Azure OpenAI, if you want to use Response API, please enter the preview version

basic_auth.label: HTTP authentication
basic_auth.tip: Applicable to instances deployed remotely (see the documentation). Currently, only the Basic scheme (RFC 7617) is supported.

copilot.code_copied: Authorization code automatically copied to clipboard
copilot.code_failed: Failed to obtain Device Code, please try again.
copilot.code_generated_desc: Please copy the device code into the browser link below.
copilot.description: Your GitHub account needs to subscribe to Copilot.
copilot.description_detail: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered code assistant that requires a valid GitHub Copilot subscription to use
copilot.open_verification_first: Please click the link above to access the verification page.
copilot.step_authorize_detail: Click the button below to open GitHub authorization page, then enter the copied authorization code
copilot.step_connect_detail: After completing authorization on GitHub page, click this button to complete the connection
copilot.step_copy_code_detail: Authorization code has been automatically copied, you can also copy it manually

delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

provider.no_models_for_check: No models available for checking (e.g. chat models)

vertex_ai.api_host_help: The API host for Vertex AI, not recommended to fill in, generally applicable to reverse proxy

quickAssistant.click_tray_to_show: Click the tray icon to start
quickAssistant.title: Quick Assistant
quickAssistant.use_shortcut_to_show: Right-click the tray icon or use shortcuts to start

quickPhrase.contentPlaceholder:
Please enter phrase content, support using variables, and press Tab to quickly locate the variable to modify. For example: 
Help me plan a route from ${from} to ${to}, and send it to ${email}.
quickPhrase.deleteConfirm: The phrase cannot be recovered after deletion, continue?
quickPhrase.title: Quick Phrases

shortcuts.label: Key
shortcuts.reset_defaults_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts?
shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts

preprocessOrOcr.tooltip: In Settings -> Tools, set a document preprocessing service provider or OCR. Document preprocessing can effectively improve the retrieval performance of complex format documents and scanned documents. OCR can only recognize text within images in documents or scanned PDF text.

websearch.blacklist_description: Results from the following websites will not appear in search results
websearch.blacklist_tooltip:
Please use the following format (separated by newlines)
Pattern matching: *://*.example.com/*
Regular expression: /example\.(net|org)/

limit.label: Cutoff Limit
limit.tooltip: Limit the content length of search results, content exceeding the limit will be truncated (e.g., 2000 characters)

document_count.label: Document Chunks Count
document_count.tooltip: Expected number of document chunks to extract from each search result, the actual total number of extracted document chunks is this value multiplied by the number of search results.

websearch.content_limit_tooltip: Limit the content length of the search results; content that exceeds the limit will be truncated.
websearch.no_provider_selected: Please select a search service provider before checking.
websearch.overwrite_tooltip: Force use search service instead of LLM

search_max_result.label: Number of search results
search_max_result.tooltip: When search result compression is disabled, the number of results may be too large, which may lead to insufficient tokens

subscribe_name.label: Alternative name
subscribe_name.placeholder: Alternative name used when the downloaded subscription feed has no name.

tavily.description: Tavily is a search engine tailored for AI agents, delivering real-time, accurate results, intelligent query suggestions, and in-depth research capabilities.
tavily.title: Tavily

websearch.title: Web Search

confirm.content: Translation will replace the original text, continue?
confirm.title: Translation Confirmation

history.clear_description: Clear history will delete all translation history, continue?
history.title: Translation History

language.not_pair: Source language is different from the set language
language.same: Source and target languages are the same

menu.description: Translate the content of the current input box

settings.bidirectional_tip: When enabled, only bidirectional translation between source and target languages is supported
